DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate efficacy Indomethacin compare Magnesium Sulfate ( MgSO4 ) reduce neonatal morbidity prospective double blind randomize clinical trial . The specific aim project test hypothesis Indomethacin , compare MgSO4 , decrease proportion neonate diagnose major complication death .
DOC.brief_title: Magnesium Sulfate Versus Indomethacin Preterm Labor
DOC.criteria: Initial episode preterm labor enrollment The diagnosis preterm labor Gestational age 24 32 week Singleton twin gestation The ability understand requirement study Cervical dilation > 5 cm Suspected chorioamnionitis Fetal distress Vaginal bleeding Severe preeclampsia History gastrointestinal bleeding Abnormal renal function Suspicion fetal malformation ultrasound Known allergy , intolerance , Magnesium sulfate and/or Indomethacin Documented rupture amniotic membrane Multiple gestation triplet .
